DataElement.preferredName: Person Laboratory Procedure Current Clinical Trial Consent Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether consent or permission was obtained from a person to participate in a medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body as part of the current clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Laboratory Procedure Current Clinical Trial Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the consent or permission from a person to participate in a medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body as part of the current clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

Property.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Current Clinical Trial Consent
Property.preferredDefinition: A medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body. Tests can help determine a diagnosis, plan treatment, check to see if treatment is working, or monitor the disease over time.:Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: I agree to participate in the
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to participate in the laboratory research studies that are being done as part of this clinical trial.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to participate in the scientific laboratory research studies that are being done as part of this clinical trial

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my tissue may be used for the research described in the protocol.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my blood and tissue may be used for the research described in the protocol

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my specimen(s) may be used for research studies to learn about the effects that the experimental treatment may be having.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my specimen(s) may be used for the research described in the protocol.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my specimens may be used for the research studies (specimens for non-inherited research) described in the protocol.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Previously collected specimens may be used for research studies in which patient chose to participate.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to have my samples collected and I agree that my samples and related information may be used for the laboratory studies described above.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to have my blood collected and I agree that my specimen sample(s) and related information may be used for the laboratory study as described.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to have my specimen collected and I agree that my specimen sample and related information may be used for the laboratory study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have blood specimen(s) collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: OPEN
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to have my tissue samples collected from procedures performed as part of my standard of care and I agree that my tissue samples and related health information may be used for the laboratory research studies described above.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient agree to have tissue and blood samples and related health information used for the BR007 study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my samples may be used for the studies described in this document.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient agree to have their samples and related health information used for the GY031 study?

DataElement.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Patient Consent Ind-2 2018303v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
